caption: Relating to the prosecution of the criminal offense of invasive visual recording and the applicability of sex offender registration requirements to that offense.
summary: This bill amends criminal law to include "invasive visual recording" as a reportable sex offense requiring registration. It expands the definition of private places where recording is prohibited and clarifies what constitutes "reasonable expectation of privacy." The law applies equally to all persons in Texas, including Chinese immigrants, making them subject to sex offender registration if convicted of invasive visual recording.
translation: 该法案修改刑法，将"侵犯性视觉录制"列为需要登记的性犯罪。法案扩大了禁止录制的私密场所的定义，并明确了何为"合理隐私期望"。该法律平等适用于德克萨斯州所有人，包括中国移民在内，如果因侵犯性视觉录制被定罪，需要进行性犯罪者登记。
